name: Roy Tang
text: Well, the problem is when I write it, "WFH" is easier. But when I say it out loud "Work from home" is easier (less syllables that double you eff eych). Maybe the correct answer is "WFH'ed", but read out loud as "worked from home"    ...these are the world's problems I spend my engineer's education on solving

source_obj.text: Well, the problem is when I write it, "WFH" is easier. But when I say it out loud "Work from home" is easier (less syllables that double you eff eych).
